question: What is the name of the initiative launched by TRIFED and IIT Kanpur and Chhattisgarh MFP Federation?
explanation:
The Tribal Cooperative Marketing Development Federation of India (TRIFED), Ministry of Tribal Affairs in association with Chhattisgarh MFP Federation and IIT Kanpur launched the ‘Tech For Tribals’ initiative.
It has been launched under the ‘Entrepreneurship Skill Development Programme’ (ESDP), in collaboration with the Ministry of Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME). Van Dhan beneficiaries across all districts of Chhattisgarh State are being trained for 6 weeks.
